title: unesco_heritage_Rock_Drawings_in_Valcamonica
text:
Name: Rock Drawings in Valcamonica. short_description:

Valcamonica, situated in the Lombardy plain, has one of the world's greatest collections of prehistoric petroglyphs â€“ more than 140,000 symbols and figures carved in the rock over a period of 8,000 years and depicting themes connected with agriculture, navigation, war and magic.
